NAME: Rohit Tomar
ABOUT:
Multi discipline techno commercial experience in aviation gathered over the last 14 years. With a penchant for problem solving, I have worked in various areas of commercial aviation including Engineering Purchase, Ground Operations, Fleet planning and Aircraft leasing, Cost Control and Finance departments. The collective experience in aviation in each of these areas strengthened the holistic approach that I bring together for problem solving within the commercial aviation industry. Personally, inclined to mentor new generation aviators to see the “Larger picture” and train their minds to solve complex business problems. 
In a razor thin margin Industry, airlines need to manage resources efficiently, develop effective controls within the organization and maintain agility to compete swiftly. Often KPI’s that drive the airlines financial parameters as viewed by the shareholders are not the true representation of the impending risks for an airline. Often expertise in one field of operations of airline is hired to fix a problem, but for an airline operating under high risk, it is not a single variable problem and airline is not the business of maximization of profit or minimization of cost. I help teams to develop the profit optimization view of airline business. 

Specialties: Airline Finance, Airline commercial strategy, Airline Cost Management, MRO Management, Ground Handling Management, Aircraft Lease Management, Engineering Procurement, Contract Management
